card.title: Outbound Calling Agent
card.description: An automated outbound calling agent for EdTech sales teams that places voice calls at set intervals, logs every interaction centrally, and gives managers a dashboard for activation and oversight.

summary.title: Case Study Summary
summary.text: We built an outbound calling agent for sales and education teams-an AI-powered business solutions approach that automates follow-ups and centralizes activity. Built on chatbots, it initiates calls on schedule and keeps every interaction traceable.

client.industry: Sales Teams & Telemarketers, EdTech & Coaching Institutes

challenge.title: Challenge
challenge.text: Too much time spent on manual calling leads. High cost of hiring and managing call staff. No single place to track or monitor call activity.

goals.title: Goals
goals.text: Automate calling leads at regular intervals. Cut down manual work and reduce costs. Offer full visibility and control through a dashboard.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: Agent makes voice calls at customizable time intervals.
details: Logs all activity with summaries in a central place
Dashboard to manage activation, intervals, and view logs
Adds to our proven chatbot use cases for outbound sales

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.text: 1.5-week development sprint: Integrated the agent with Google Sheets. Configured the agent to automatically initiate calls at defined time intervals. Designed controls for activation, retry rules, and audit logs-unlike typical customer service chatbots, this agent is proactive and traceable.

results.title: Results
results.text: Manual call workload will reduce by 60%
details: Lead response rate will improve by 40%
All calls will be 100% traceable through detailed logs

testimonial.quote: "This bot will change how we handle our outreach. Our team will become faster and more focused."
testimonial.author: Ankit Verma, Head of Sales

keyTakeaway.title: Key Takeaway
keyTakeaway.text: A well-designed outbound calling bot reduces manual effort, increases lead engagement, and drives measurable growth with minimal operational overhead.

cta.title: Access Outbound Calling Agent Story
cta.description: See how inside-sales teams automate follow-ups, simplify logging, and gain real control with a proactive calling agent. If you’re in sales or EdTech, this case shows what’s possible with AI computer solutions for outreach and team efficiency.
